Sequence Information.Peptide Name: P2-Ll-1298  (XXA, UCLL1c; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (46.7%) toPleurain-B1Activity:  Active against E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 24.6 uM) and S. aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC 49 uM).Toxicity:  50% Hemolysis conc HC50< 20 uM, highly hemolytic.Structure:  Helical in 50% TFE or DPPG vesicles but not DPPC, indicating the importance of electrostatic interactions.Updated 7/2021; 2/2022; 10/2024
Literature Information.Author: Siano A, Humpola MV, de Oliveira E, Albericio F, Simonetta AC, Lajmanovich R, Tonarelli GG.2018
Literature Information.Title: Leptodactylus latrans Amphibian Skin Secretions as a Novel Source for the Isolation of Antibacterial Peptides.
